channel.title: PyVISA on Shehao Li
channel.description: Recent content in PyVISA on Shehao Li

item.title: Auto Load-Off Test
item.description: Python GUI that automates instrument-driven test runs: configures devices via SCPI/PyVISA, executes repeatable sweeps, logs results, and generates plots.

item.title: Test Automation MultiTimer
item.description: Python Tkinter GUI that automates time-bounded DMM monitoring over VISA/SCPI: configures measurement mode/range and samples on a fixed interval with logging and optional MAT export.
